Row.Text: Leader, do you agree with the phrase, "Love is War?" If you do, then consider this my love confession!
Leader, do you agree with the phrase, "Love is War?" If you do, then consider this my love confession!
Love is indeed War. But, you know, even Friendships can be War, too. Such as...the one between us, which I consider officially over as of right now!
That's a shame to hear. Although, this will give us a chance to test out our flame synthesizers instead of just testing our voice synthesizers all the time.
Did I hear you right? You plan on fighting us with an army THAT tiny? Oh well, it's your funeral. I'll sing at it after I kill you!
Real tough guy you are, attacking a bunch of defenseless beings who were designed only to sing...
That's a shame to hear. Although, this will give us a chance to test out our flame synthesizers instead of just testing our voice synthesizers all the time.
Did I hear you right? You plan on fighting us with an army THAT tiny? Oh well, it's your funeral. I'll sing at it after I kill you!
Real tough guy you are, attacking a bunch of defenseless beings who were designed only to sing...
H-hold on...how can this be? The world was supposed to be mine![NEWLINE] Just...just don't burn down the onion farms, okay...?
Welcome to Yamaha, otherwise known as the land of the Vocaloids! I'm Hatsune Miku, the number one princess in the world! Just kidding, I'm not a princess. I'm actually a queen!
I'm glad you finally got used to eating raw spring onions! Even if that face you used to make while eating them was priceless.

Oh hey, you wanna hear my new single? It's called "You and Your Country are a Bunch of Disgusting Morons." I know you're pretty vain, so you can go ahead and think the song is about you. Because it is.
Well, I know your soldiers aren't standing outside because they're waiting on a concert. What's the deal? Are you planning to invade us?!
Corporate HQ is getting pretty tired of your incessant land-grabbing. You need to stop immediately or suffer the consequences.
Allowing Open Borders between our nations will surely increase the sales of Vocaloid synthesizers! That's a win-win situation, don't you think?
